name: Swich Tile
description:
Classic jumping game, bring back your memory of childhood!

Swich Tile Jump is a classic platform game. You can get exciting experience of jumping & running . It combines the old play and new arcade elements. This is the most challenging adventure! Take you back to your childhood!

Swich Tile Jump Features

- Over 100+ challenging levels, more levels are coming soon

- Stunning graphics, run better

- boost your 

Relax, and let’s take an adventure in Swich Tile
